attributes.action: Remove the requirement to justify why an arrest is necessary  from the Serious and Organised Crime Bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under current legislation should a criminal break the law it is no guarentee that the Police can arrest them unless they can satisfy certain criteria.
This measure is not only applied to serious offences but every offence.
If your neighbour assualted you would you want them arrested? If the Police know who they are and where they live they are unable to lawfully arrest them.
A Police force not Social workers with a uniform is what we want.
